thread.title: Ronnie O'Sullivan in 12th Masters final with win over Marco Fu
thread.title_full: Ronnie O'Sullivan in 12th Masters final with win over Marco Fu

title: Ronnie O'Sullivan in 12th Masters final with win over Marco Fu

persons.name: marco fu by shamoon hafez read

text:
Ronnie O'Sullivan in 12th Masters final with win over Marco Fu By Shamoon Hafez Read more about sharing. O'Sullivan has won the Masters a joint-record six times along with Stephen Hendry Defending champion Ronnie O'Sullivan overcame a split cue tip to reach his 12th Masters final with a 6-4 win over Marco Fu at Alexandra Palace. 
Hong Kong's Fu opened with breaks of 110 and 89 to lead 2-1 before O'Sullivan needed to repair his cue. 
He returned with breaks of 122, 95, 82 and 55 but Fu replied with 141 - the highest of the tournament - and 89, before O'Sullivan's 69 put him through. 
Barry Hawkins meets fellow Englishman Joe Perry in the second semi-final. 
More to follow.
